Directed by Michael Showalter. Francesca Gregorini. Erica Watson.

Written by Elizabeth Meriwether. Elizabeth Meriwether. Elizabeth Meriwether. Wei-Ning Yu. Wei-Ning Yu. Sofya Levitsky-Weitz. Sofya Levitsky-Weitz. Hilary Bettis. Liz Hannah. Liz Heldens. Dan LeFranc. Matt Lutsky.

Cast  Naveen Andrews( Sunny Balwani ) . Michel Gill( Chris Holmes ) . William H. Macy( Richard Fuisz ) . Elizabeth Marvel( Noel Holmes ) . Sam Waterston( George Shultz ) . Anne Archer( Charlotte Shultz ) . Kate Burton( Rochelle Gibbons ) . Stephen Fry( Ian Gibbons ) . Bill Irwin( Channing Robertson ) . Laurie Metcalf( Dr. Phyllis Gardner ) . Dylan Minnette( Tyler Shultz ) . Mary Lynn Rajskub( Lorraine Fuisz ) . Utkarsh Ambudkar( Rakesh Dewan ) . Ebon Moss-Bachrach( John Carreyrou ) . LisaGay Hamilton( Judith Baker ) . Camryn Mi-young Kim( Erika Cheung ) . Bashir Salahuddin( Brendan Morris ) . Kurtwood Smith( David Boies ) . Kevin Sussman( Mark Roessler ) . Michaela Watkins( Linda Tanner ) . Shaun J. Brown( Daniel Young ) . James Hiroyuki Liao( Edmond Ku ) . Josh Pais( Wade Miquelon ) . Alan Ruck( Dr. Jay Rosan ) . Michael Ironside( Don Lucas ) . Sam Straley( Christian Holmes ) . Brad Griffith( Board Member ) . Kristin Lindquist( Moderator ) . Jasmin/epe Lu( Samantha Ku ) . Alanna Phillips( Theranos Employee ) . Mikaya Fisher( Young Elizabeth Holmes (11 Yrs Old) ) . Andrew Leeds( Roland ) . Kate Comer( Miriam ) . Jake Satow( Christian Holmes (14 Yrs Old) ) . Rich Sommer( Kevin Hunter ) . Jeff Bee( Herschel ) . Elinor Gunn( Interviewer ) . Angel Parker( Interviewer ) . Amir Arison( Avie Tevanian ) . Patrick Luwis( Gavin ) . Syra McCarthy( Cynthia ) . Elaine Rivkin( Receptionist ) . David Burke( Lawyer ) . Megan Ashley Brown( Marcy ) . Jim Hanna( Steve Burd ) . Kari Lee Cartwright( Paula Ku ) . Robert J. Chu( Police Officer ) . Zhaleh Vossough( Junior Exec ) . Garrett Coffey( Billy Evans ) . Nicky Endres( Ana Arriola ) . Jack Buckley( Cute Guy ) . Sarah Haruko( Arizona Doctor ) . Carolyne Chen( Emma Ku ) . June Laporte( Tess ) . Peter James Smith( Gary Yamamoto ) . Mark Weiler( Security Guard #4 ) . Michael Oosterom( Man ) . Lana Danielyan( Scientist ) . Tice Proctor( Young Christian Holmes (8 Yrs Old) ) . Dave Kumar( Officiant ) . Damon K. Sperber( Boies Lawyer ) . Elena Rosa( April ) . Sean Michael Boozer( Doctor ) . Eilene Gil( Female Employee (Theranos) ) . Mike Baker( Oncology Doctor ) . Brooke Becker( Last Assistant ) . Ryan Ashton( Cycling Onesie VC ) . Yossie Mulyadi( Fired Employee ) . Piper Major( Nurse ) . Paris Peterson( Tommy ) . David Danipour( Grad Student ) . Eli Revivo( Uber Driver ) . Katie Page( Patient X ) . Susan Harmon( Helena ) . Jesten Mariconda( Shane ) . Aaron Colom( Car Dealer ) . Joe Nieves( Patrick ) . Micaela Wittman( Sorority Girl #1 ) . Gabriel Oliva( Bored VC ) . Roberts Jekabsons( Customs Agent ) . Yumarie Morales( Sorority Girl #2 ) . Davey Johnson( Paul ) . Deep Rai( Flirty VC ) . Robert W. Perkins( Security Guard #1 ) . Robert Batiste( Messenger ) . Troy A. Cephers( Security Guard #2 ) . Laura Estelle Edwards( Beijing Rommate #1 ) . Miguel Cohen( Security Guard #3 ) . Cecily Breaux( Beijing Rommate #2 ) . Pierce Nasser( Waiter ) . Asia Rose Gordon( Beijing Rommate #3 ) . Steve Trzaska( Fanboy ) . Titus Lam( First iPhone Customer ) . Robin D. Stanton( Office Worker (uncredited) ) . Luke Matheis( Theranos Engineer (uncredited) ) . Heywood McGuffee( First Class Passenger (uncredited) ) . Hart Bochner( Larry Ellison (uncredited) ) . Sophia Bui( Stanford Lacrosse player (uncredited) ) . Monroe Cline( Stanford Roommate (uncredited) ) . Meredith VanCuyk( Hostess (uncredited) ) . Vincent Lionetti( Scientist (uncredited) ) . Johnny Mansbach( First Class Passenger (uncredited) ) . Daniel Blum( CO-STAR (uncredited) ) . Alfred K. Chow( Bored Venture Capitalist (uncredited) ) . Steve Sanders( Engineer (uncredited) ) . Ryan Obermeier( Scientist (uncredited) ) . Justin Dew( Bartender (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Megan Mascena Gaspar. Liz Hannah. Liz Heldens. Zachary Panozzo. Katherine Pope. Hilton Smith. Allan Tran. Taylor Dunn. Rebecca Jarvis. Michael Showalter. Victoria Thompson. Elizabeth Meriwether. Jason Ramos. Jordana Mollick. Amanda Seyfried. Hilary Bettis.

Production 20th Television. Elizabeth Meriwether Pictures. Searchlight Television.

 

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 8

Status Finished (2022–2022)
